name: MKX
title: MK X
author: Siffer & Tyfl0n
description:
This mod adds an extra mk for the things you love in Factorio. Power Armor mk 3? You got it! Speed-, Efficiency-, and Productivity module 4? Most definitely! Productivity modules can now be placed in Beacons, while the Productivity module 4 does not have recipe-based limitations. Enjoy :D

2020-10-13 Version 0.1.0
-Added Power armor mk3
-Added Speed-, Efficiency-, and Productivity module 4
-Productivity modules can be placed in beacons
-Productivity module 4 has no recipe-based limitations

2020-10-14 Version 0.2.0
-Added Portable fusion reactor mk2
-Added Assembling machine 4
-Added new items to the technology tree

2020-10-15 Version 0.2.1
-Assembling machine now looks different from assembling machine 3
-Added module 4 to the tech tree
-Changed and added to descriptions


 -Siffer & Tyflon
